sentences.sContent: Huck was sitting on the gunwale of a flatboat, listlessly dangling his feet in the water and looking very melancholy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Huck was sitting on the gunwale of a flatboat, listlessly dangling his feet in the water and looking very melancholy.
sentences.sCn: 哈克坐在一条平底船的船舷上边，两只脚没精打采地放在水里，看上去忧心忡忡。

trans.tranOther: any boat with a flat bottom, usually for transporting goods on a canal or river
